hero.title: A Modern Trust Layer for Real Estate Discovery
hero.description: SeaNeB helps property seekers and businesses connect with verified, structured, and local-first experiences.

mission: Make real estate discovery transparent, location-aware, and action-oriented for every user.
vision: Become the most trusted property platform where verified data and faster connections drive better decisions.

workflow.description: Explore listings by country, state, city, and locality.
Reach verified businesses directly from listing pages.
Compare options and move confidently with complete context.

verification: Business profile checks for trust and transparency.
Listing detail quality checks to reduce spam and noise.
Location hierarchy mapping for accurate discovery.

cta.title: Explore SeaNeB in your city
cta.description: Discover verified listings and partner-ready workflows.
